channel.title: How do i fix this error?
channel.description:
I run the server for about 5 mins, and then it kicks everyone off and gives me this error
# There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue. # Native memory allocation (malloc) failed to allocate 32744 bytes for ChunkPool ::allocate Press any key to continue . .
how do i fix it?.

item.title: How do i fix this error?
item.dc:creator: @youda_fucking_best youda fucking best
item.description:
@youda_fucking_best wrote:

did that, cleaned alot out, didn’t help still does it… How do i change how often char files save?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i fix this error?
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.description:
@NumberEleven wrote:

I had the same problem, but then i looked in my recycling bin and realised that was full to the top!

Try deleting some

Hope this helped
